mapper.insert: insert into student (stu_id, stu_no, grade, major_id, `name`, phone, email, one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven, twelve) values (#{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{one,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{two,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{three,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{four,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{five,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{six,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{seven,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{eight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{nine,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ten,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{eleven,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{twelve,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update student set stu_no = #{stuNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, major_id = #{majorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, one = #{one,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, two = #{two,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, three = #{three,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, four = #{four,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, five = #{five,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, six = #{six,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, seven = #{seven,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, eight = #{eight,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, nine = #{nine,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ten = #{ten,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, eleven = #{eleven,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, twelve = #{twelve,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select stu_id, stu_no, grade, major_id, `name`, phone, email, one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten, eleven, twelve from student where stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
